website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward and functional set with a few minor design flaws.
pros: Good looking design that works well with just about any table setting
Great price for the number of glasses, making this an affordable starter or backup glassware set
cons: Lightweight construction may not be the most durable

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great. I bought these for my dad as an Xmas present and he loves them. They look great, seem durable, came with zero defects, and looks like the product picture shown. They were also handled with care. None of them were delivered broken or even scratched. I’m very happy with this purchase, and highly recommend these if you’re looking for new drinking glasses. ***If helpful, please click ‘Helpful’*** :)
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easily broken!  Density of glass will not hold up to contact with sink or other objects.
customer_reviews.text: I have for many years trusted Libby's for style and design. But was disappointed in these as they look and feel fragile. I got one of my original set out and weighed it on my kitchen scale and it is very close to one lb. whereas my new glass weighs slightly less than 1/2 lb although they are roughly the same height. I do not advise use by children.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila G. Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are nice they looked small but held just as much as my other glasses..very light weight I'm very satisified
customer_reviews.author: Al Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of glasses
customer_reviews.text: I usually prefer to select glasses in person but I decided to give these a try. They are a little smaller than I had expected but that's my fault for not paying attention to the ounces. Anyway they were so nice I decided to keep them. They are perfect for everyday use but look nice enough to use for company as well.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Narrow openings
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 16 oz glasses and they are quite dainty in appearance. They look smaller than they are. The glass feels thick enough and heavy enough so that I don't feel like I'm going to break it if I set it down the wrong way or break in my hand. You'll need to use the dishwasher or a bottle brush to clean as you won't be able to fit your hand through the narrow top. All in all, I'm pleased with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: a girl is not no one

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Very light glass. Great for dinner, company.. fine glass and the have an excellent design about them. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B+Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about these glasses. The feel, the design and the look. I am very pleased with my purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: These glasses look exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look exactly like the picture. They are light weight but sturdy and a good. Perfect for everyday glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Drinking glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are nice looking & fit a hand good, but they do break fairly easy. Ice shooting down from a fridge dispenser will knock the side out of you aren't careful. Not good for ceramic sinks or granite counter. I'm soon going to need to get something different because I won't have any left.
customer_reviews.author: A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: NOT 16 ounces
customer_reviews.text: I filled one of these glasses to the VERY TOP, and it measured 14 ounces, NOT 16 ounces. To keep the liquid from spilling, you would have to allow room at the top so I am guessing that this glass will comfortably hold 12 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cape

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Had 6 of these glasses for the past 15 + years. When I was down to the last one a few weeks ago. I didn’t even know if they were made any more. Was thrilled to find them. I love them because they are easy to hold, durable (except when my husband drops them in the sink by accident or one of my grandchildren knocks it to the floor LOL) and I am picky about not having thick rims on my glasses or coffee mugs. These are perfect! Since they came in a 12 pack, I think these will get handed down after I’m 6 feet under. (Hopefully not for another 25 years or so!)
customer_reviews.author: Maureen W.

customer_reviews.title: Not A Diamond pattern, but nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: So not a diamond. It's a swirl that appears to be a diamond when you look through the empty glass. Still pretty, I will keep them but I would have preferred the pattern as it appears in the photos and not a 'swirl'.
customer_reviews.author: This One

customer_reviews.title: Quality Glasses for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these after working my way through my old water glasses breaking them one by one until I only had 3 left. These are sturdy, look lovely, the rounded rim makes it easy to drink from, and they have a large capacity without looking like huge glasses. I would buy them again and recommend them to anyone looking for some great everyday water glasses (that could also be used for nice occasions thanks to their nice swirl design).
customer_reviews.author: Janet P

customer_reviews.title: TOO THIN
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very pretty. but seem too thin and fragile for my family. I have kept them and do use them, but am ordering another set that is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: butch russell

customer_reviews.title: Not what  i  expected .
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the glasses .. cheap looking and very small . If I didn’t need them for thanksgiving, I would return them .
customer_reviews.author: AnnShuss

customer_reviews.title: Pretty scroll design and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are exactly as I had hoped. Pretty scroll design and not too heavy.....
customer_reviews.author: Cathie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well, fits my smallish woman hands perfectly and head latex through 2 dishwashing cycles so far.
customer_reviews.author: MtnRo

customer_reviews.title: Thin thin thinnn
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses but they are very flimsy. They are pretty thin and break very easily. I broke 2 by putting them in the sink.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE GLASSES AT REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED THE GLASSES AND I APPRECIATE THE PRICE. WOULD RECCOMEND THESE TO ANYONE WHO LIKES A NICE GDRINKING GLASS AT A REASONABLE PRICE AND I Also got a dozen of them. thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank You!! I Like These drinking glasses, great price and Thank you for packing so nice and neat, they all came in one piece. I Love Libbey's stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi J. Krone (Phire)

customer_reviews.title: Glass is slippery when condensation forms on the outside.
customer_reviews.text: I assumed the dimensional swirl of glass pictured would be on the outside, making it easier to grasp. Instead, the outside is smooth. They’re pretty and they’ll serve the purpose I ordered them for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Classy, elegant glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses; they're somewhat more delicate than our previous glasses which were sturdy pint glasses, and that's not a bad thing. The design is subtle and matches the overall midcentury modern aesthetic of our apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add to my collection of similar style glasses. These almost match. Most people would never tell the difference if these and my older ones were sitting side by side unless they were really looking at them. I like this style and fits my needs perfectly. I was so glad to find these and at a reasonable price. I saw them elsewhere on the internet for a whole lot more. I also like the fact that I could get all of one size.
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. We received all in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. We received all in perfect condition. No probs.
customer_reviews.author: Laguna Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great glass, could be a little wider
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are well-made and a nice size. They also look very nice. The only thing I would change is their width. They are too small to fit your hand all the way in if you'd like to wash them by hand. They seem to hold up well in the dishwasher though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah & Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pattern, the shape, and the size of the glasses. I also liked the fact that there were 12 of them!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Graffius

customer_reviews.title: Great party glassware
customer_reviews.text: These were for a party and arrived well wrapped. They are lightweight and though not fancy glasses they are perfectly good for daily use and didn't look plain.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Glassware that Holds Up.
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a new glassware set so that I could have matching glasses once again for my Thanksgiving table. When I couldn't find anything I liked for a reasonable price in the stores, I purchased this set on amazon and I was not disappointed. Very pretty. Very sturdy. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: tonimariep

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review in full because they are brand new. They are not heavy, or clunky. I have small hands and I like the way these feel.
customer_reviews.author: P.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, large quantity for price. Look a little more formal than the standard plain drinking/tea glass
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for glasses that looked nice enough to put out with good dishes and have ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for glasses that looked nice enough to put out with good dishes and have company use, yet durable enough to use everyday. I really liked these glasses, but they are thin. Several of them have broken just by washing them and one tipped over in the sink and broke to pieces.I am once again having to buy new glasses and have only had these a few months. This time I'm trying Anchor Hocking ones that seem much more sturdy yet look nice and are also made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are about 14.5oz not 16oz like stated in the description. Also the top is too narrow to get your hand inside the glass to clean them. Other than that they are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Toni A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, a bit shorter that other Libby glasses I've purchased but nice feel in the hand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in hand
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are nice looking. Dropped one and it didn't break.
customer_reviews.author: carol beth johnson

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Affordable price however very thin and hard to clean. I already broke 2 glasses
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Masters

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for what they are, I don't feel bad when they break and they look nice enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. Really like the swirl pattern
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. Really like the swirl pattern. I highly recommend these glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Perfect size. Have held up pretty well so far. Like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Geo G

customer_reviews.title: Every day use
customer_reviews.text: I like these cups. They are a bit smaller then expected and not very heavy but for the price they were the perfect replacement water glasses for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: James Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Quality and size
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these drinking glasses. I prefer a glass you can hold well without it being bulky. This is the best size and very pretty at that
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses and the price. Andrea in customer service at Libbey was a great help and very friendly. Always refreshing. I'll buy again from Libbey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so excited
customer_reviews.text: I love them!!! they are not to thin and not to thick, I was iffy about getting them after reading the reviews but I am glad I did I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These glasses were exactly as expected, delivered in a ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were exactly as expected, delivered in a timely fashion, were well packaged and were reasonably priced. You can't ask for a lot more for a set of drinking glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Sans

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easy
customer_reviews.text: These glasses break too easy, I wish I would have purchased some that were heavier.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: I knew these weren't the thick heavy glasses from reading the reviews. These were just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Glasses for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, inexpensive but not cheap quality. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Josypenko

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just didn't realize how small the top of glass is. Very uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.author: Boothbabies#4

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. I would have liked them to be thicker but that's just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: nice but not for us
customer_reviews.text: More narrow and tall than I realized. I returned because my kids would be more apt to knock over. Otherwise nice looking glasses for a lightening deal - just didn't serve my purpose
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: My bad
customer_reviews.text: They are much smaller than I had expected but that’s my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to drink from & to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Easy to to hold. Very nice for iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. Sturdy and lite. Only reason I gave 4 stars is the opening is on the small side to drink out of.
customer_reviews.author: Ash2011

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They are a great set of glasses. Not too heavy but sturdy and perfect size for a drinking glass
customer_reviews.author: karen champlin

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are great to use
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great to use. I am 83 and wanted something pretty but durable and easy to hold. This works perfectly. I dropped a glass a few days ago and it bounced on the laminate floor but did not break or crack. I am very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Andres

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Glasses have a very pretty design. They are light weight and can be placed close together in cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: but good size and well packed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, not as big as I hoped, but good size and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Belangee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: None came broken, looks like what was advertised and described, and a good deal with the price and amount of cups. This totally replaced my awful, ugly, bachelor-mismatched "set". No complaints--but I've only had that for less than 24-hours, so if something happens down the line, I will amend this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking glasses! They also seem quite durable for normal everyday use.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of boring. Some of the bottoms not exactly flat.
customer_reviews.author: Northern bound

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thin glass. Feel too breakable in hand. Returned them
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the glasses I was looking for at the right price. Everywhere else was just offering the same old types of glasses. Shipping was great and they arrived quickly, nothing broken.
customer_reviews.author: riddick

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: They are nice! I get a few in the box so 12. One fell and broke but I was high up and I have hard floors. Good value though.
customer_reviews.author: jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Oh so pretty
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. They go very nicely with the rest of my dishes. They are tall so one can put in plenty of water and ice. The pattern looks lovely. They also seem pretty sturdy. None of mine broke yet despite dishwasher, teens and cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonka

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We got this style 32 years ago as a wedding present. Just broke the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size durability
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking for a larger glass. Do you have the same glass in a larger size. More oz.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Slightly small and hard to wash by hand, but definitely nice solid product
customer_reviews.author: John P Smith

customer_reviews.title: Holding up to a house full of klutzes.
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived I thought 'not good'. They are good looking glasses and clean up well in the dishwasher but man are they lightweight. I just replaced so heavier glasses due to the inability of kids to hang on to cups. Remarkably enough these things keep bouncing off the floor and staying together. It been something to watch. I have only lost 2 glasses so far and no cracks or chips. I can't explain it but it's happening right in front of me. Great price for these deceptively strong glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sattler

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and right size. Exactly as described. The packaging was outstanding, all the glasses arrived unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Norys

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday glassware.
customer_reviews.text: We liked these so much that we ordered another dozen.
customer_reviews.author: Rich B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WE USE THEM DAILY AND THEY ARE JUST THE RIGHT SIZE AND SHAPE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality glasses. I like the design and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Billy V

customer_reviews.title: Glasses are glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses worked well for what we needed for everyday use. They are stylish, and make for a nice glass of milk or other beverage. Obviously dishwasher safe, Nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Jerry. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: good for the price. they feel like they would break easy though.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a middle-ground glassware set and this set is surprisingly nice quality. Have been using the set for two weeks and none of them have broken. I will hopefully update this review if anything changes. Also, the swirl is not ribbed--the glass is smooth on both surfaces. Light-weight and beautiful looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: i like how light weight these are but kinda disappointed how ...
customer_reviews.text: i like how light weight these are but kinda disappointed how thin the glass is. For the price and quantity is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Decent Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my younger sister's first apartment. They are perfect for something like that. They aren't anything special, but they are nice for everyday use. Just what I expected. :)
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I like these I would only caution they are small on ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these I would only caution they are small on the top making it difficult to use the refrigerator icemakers & water dispenser
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice everyday drinking glass
customer_reviews.text: These glasses arrived on time and were packaged excellently. They are really nice looking and are a nice addition to our everyday dining.
customer_reviews.author: RFR

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for my arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I use these for every day. I have arthritis in my hands. They’re easy to hold, lightweight and not too big for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Haugh

customer_reviews.title: glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses I got them as a gift and they are great I would recommend these to anyone and my family and friends
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Weston

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is thicker than what appears in the picture. For the price, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was as expected :)
customer_reviews.text: They're exactly what I expected. I tend to drop things a lot and these have held up so far. Happy with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fabro

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: They are very fragile. I broke one while holding it!
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed W Asran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I expected and have held up well in the dishwasher and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not really a diamond design
customer_reviews.text: I thought these glasses would have an actual diamond design on them. They have a wrapping swirl design. When you look through them the swirls on the back of the glass intersect the swirls on the front of the glass creating a diamond, or trellised, design appearance. If I’d known that I probably would have went with a glass with an actual diamond design. That said, the glasses are still pretty, shipped promptly, and were all intact so I’m using them and I’m probably the only one who knows that these glasses weren’t really what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gagel

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are nice my only argument is that they are a little bit small. Otherwise they are excellent, anyone who buys them might want to buy a set of larger glasses also.
customer_reviews.author: digigirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that they are light weight and durable. The design is nice and easy to handle when drinking. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: We have had this set for over a year now and have used them daily. Not a single one has broken or been damaged in any way, and they have been dropped several times. I run them through the dishwasher every night, and they are still shiny and cloud free. I love the stylish, lightweight design and I am very pleased that they are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: American House Wife

customer_reviews.title: Tall water glasses
customer_reviews.text: These water glasses meet my approval in size, appearance and function. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a beautiful water glass for dining.
customer_reviews.author: Diann C. Johansen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty glasses
customer_reviews.text: Good glasses, a little thin and a few broke in the dishwasher right away but the rest of them are still doing good. I think it was a mixture of heat stress and a few from pulling the tray out to fast and having them clank on the heavy bricks that the libby beer mugs are.
customer_reviews.author: shop for thing

customer_reviews.title: Nice glassware
customer_reviews.text: We can never seem to keep glasses very long. These were a little lighter in the base than I expected, but they look great. Great price and delivered a day earlier than quoted. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY RAE BRAKEFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful drinking glasses for everyone
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty and very strong. They will not break easily so families with children will be happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Canney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are absolutely beautiful. The price was excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: chica730

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are nice and sleek - what i was looking for. Please note that the glass holds 16 oz right up to the brim so more realistically they are 14-15 but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Capital Treasure

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy glass
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very elegant, and tough - I would purchase them again, they are also the perfect size too
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for my daughter in college. She loves them and have not broken one yet. She says they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Count

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like is that you can't stack them. Very pretty otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yup its a  drinking glass
customer_reviews.text: 4th review on same item it still holds water. Beware I found if you drop on tile floor the glasses will break !
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Thin Glass
customer_reviews.text: A little thinner glass than expected but for the price I couldn't be happier. I'd buy another set in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works great for us people on a diet. If you want fat and salt, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

product_meta.title: Libbey Diamond Swirl Tumbler Glasses, Set of 12
product_meta.description:
This set of 12 stylish tumblers will immediately elevate your drinkware collection. The diamond pattern adds unique personality to beautifully clear glass, making even the simplest drinks feel impressive. Designed to be durable and dishwasher-safe, these tumbler glasses are perfect for everyday use.

Celebrate This! with Glassware from Libbey
If you’ve ever sipped from a glass, odds are you’ve already met Libbey. We rank as the top glassware manufacturer in the Americas and one of the largest tableware suppliers in the world. As the runaway leader, we are setting new standards for stability, strength, and growth opportunity. We believe every occasion — big and small — is an opportunity to celebrate life.
feature_bullets: All purpose drinking glasses perfect for a variety of beverages -- twelve 16-ounce tumbler drinking glasses
Glasses feature an elegant swirl design
Durable yet elegant glassware ideal for everyday use and special occasions
Lead-free. Securely packaged in shipping box; always wash prior to use as orders fulfilled by Libbey are shipped directly from manufacturer's warehouse
Durable and dishwasher-safe; to help preserve your products, please refer to the Libbey website for care and handling instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars464 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
